sentences.en: ...machines for peeling and coring apples.
sentences.cn: …苹果削皮去核机。

sentences.en: A core of about six staff would continue with the project.
sentences.cn: 由大约6名职员组成的骨干队伍将继续该项目。

sentences.en: A hard-core group of right-wing senators had hoped to sway their colleagues.
sentences.cn: 一群骨干右翼参议员曾企图左右自己的同僚。

sentences.en: Debt is at the core of the problem.
sentences.cn: 债务是问题的关键。

sentences.en: How-ever, the main core of the company performed outstandingly.
sentences.cn: 然而，该公司的主营业务却表现出色。

sentences.en: Remove the cores, and bake the apples for 40 minutes.
sentences.cn: 去除果心，然后把苹果烤40分钟。

sentences.en: She had a little core of self-will.
sentences.cn: 她有点固执。

sentences.en: she was shaken to the core by his words.
sentences.cn: 她被他的话彻底动摇了。

sentences.en: the core of a nuclear reactor
sentences.cn: 核反应堆的活性区

sentences.en: The core of regular contributors is essential to the magazine.
sentences.cn: 有一群经常投稿的人对这份杂志是极为重要的.

sentences.en: The core of the book focuses on the period between 1660 and 1857.
sentences.cn: 这本书的中心内容集中在1660年到1857年这段时期。

sentences.en: The core of the city is a series of ancient squares.
sentences.cn: 市中心是一座接一座古老的广场。

sentences.en: The core subjects are English, mathematics and science.
sentences.cn: 基础课是英文、数学和科学。

sentences.en: the core subjects of English, Maths and Science
sentences.cn: 英语、数学和自然科学这些核心科目

sentences.en: The course consists of ten core modules and five optional modules.
sentences.cn: 这门课程包括十个必修单元和五个选修单元。

sentences.en: The group plans to concentrate on six core businesses.
sentences.cn: 该集团打算主营6种业务。

sentences.en: The neutrons and protons form the core of the atom.
sentences.cn: 中子和质子构成了原子核.

sentences.en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentences.cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentences.en: The villagers are royalist to the core.
sentences.cn: 那些村民是十足的保皇主义者。

sentences.en: We didn't get to the core of the subject.
sentences.cn: 我们没触及问题的核心.

words.tran_cn: 心脏；英国管（等于English horn或tenor oboe）
核化；结晶偏析；[地质] 取岩心
去（果）核；提取岩芯（core的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 核心竞争力；核心能力；关键才能
型芯材料，裂变物质；内层芯板，磁心材料
矿样；岩芯样本；土芯样本

trans.tran_cn: 核心的，主要的，基本的，骨干的
核心，要点，核儿，基础，骨干，主要业务，中心部分
trans.tran_en: the hard central part of a fruit such as an apple
to remove the centre from a fruit
to remove the centre from a fruit
